document.full_text: u.s. health regulators said on wednesday that patients taking prescription ulcer drugs at high doses or for longer periods may have increased risk of fractures of the hip, wrist and spine.
document.title: fda says high doses of ulcer drug pose bigger fracture
lines_and_colors: u.s. health regulators said on wednesday that patients taking prescription ulcer drugs at high doses or for longer periods may have increased risk of fractures of the hip, wrist and spine.
